Polisi Kembali Berlakukan Sistem Buka-Tutup di Puncak
03 Nov 2019, 17:14 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - Polres Bogor mengantisipasi penumpukan kendaraan dari Puncak menuju Jakarta. Sistem satu arah atau one way masih diberlakukan hingga sore hari ini.
Kasat Lantas Polres Bogor AKP Fadli Amri membenarkan adanya penutupan ruas jalan dari Jakarta menuju Puncak Bogor. Fadli menyebut sistem itu biasa diberlakukan polisi.
"Iya pemberlakuan sistem one way turun arah Jakarta (diberlakukan hari ini). Ini memang prosedur biasa kalau pemberlakuan one way dan sudah berlangsung setiap weekend, Sabtu dan Minggu," jelas AKP Fadli saat dimintai konfirmasi detikcom, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Fadli mengatakan penutupan itu dimulai di pintu tol Jakarta yang mengarah ke Puncak, Bogor. Sistem one way itu berlangsung pada pukul 12.30 WIB hingga pukul 19.00 WIB nanti.
"Hari ini ditutup lebih cepat, yang biasanya jam 13.00 WIB tadi jam 12.30 WIB, karena sejak pagi jalur puncak tidak ada pemberlakuan one way, untuk memfasilitasi warga puncak yang akan hadir memberikan suara di pilkades serentak Kabupaten Bogor," ungkap Fadli.
Fadli menyebut saat ini kondisi lalu lintas di sekitar Puncak menuju Jakarta terpantau lancar. Kepadatan terpantau dari arah Jakarta menuju Puncak Bogor hanya sepanjang 100 meter akibat dari sistem one way itu.
"Antrean akibat penutupan hanya 100 meter karena hari Minggu mayoritas kendaraan ke arah Jakarta. Lalin juga terpantau lancar karena diberlakukan one way," pungkas Fadli.

(sam/zap)

Police Again Enact Open-Close System at the Peak
03 Nov 2019, 17:14 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - Bogor Police anticipated a buildup of vehicles from Puncak to Jakarta. The one-way or one way system is still in effect until this afternoon.
Kasat Lantas Bogor Police AKP Fadli Amri confirmed the existence of the closure of roads from Jakarta to Puncak Bogor. Fadli said the system was usually imposed by the police.
"Yes, the implementation of the one way system down towards Jakarta (implemented today). This is indeed a normal procedure if the application of one way and has been going on every weekend, Saturday and Sunday," explained AKP Fadli when asked to confirm AFP on Sunday (3/11/2019) .
Fadli said the closure began at the Jakarta toll road that leads to Puncak, Bogor. The one way system takes place at 12:30 WIB until 19:00 WIB later.
"Today is closed faster, which is usually at 13.00 West Indonesia Time at 12:30 West Indonesia Time, because since the morning the peak lane has no one way application, to facilitate the peak residents who will be present to vote in the simultaneous Pilkades of Bogor Regency," said Fadli.
Fadli said that the current traffic conditions around Puncak to Jakarta were monitored smoothly. The density is monitored from the direction of Jakarta to Bogor Peak only 100 meters long as a result of the one way system.
"The queue due to the closure was only 100 meters because on Sunday the majority of vehicles headed for Jakarta. Traffic was also monitored smoothly because of the one way imposed," concluded Fadli.
